translations: 超链接；超级链接（hyperlink 复数）

sentences.sentence: It has a very interesting feature: hyperlinks!
sentences.translation: 它具备一个十分有趣的特点：超文本链接！

sentences.sentence: There are no distracting hyperlinks on a typewriter.
sentences.translation: 打字机上不会出现令人分心的超链接。

sentences.sentence: You an also define hyperlinks as depicted in Figure 9.
sentences.translation: 您也可以定义超链接，如图9所示。
